amendment.description: To modify a provision relating to the authorization of appropriations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3859 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3859 proposed by Senator Ensign for Senator McCain to Amendment SA 3858. (consideration: CR S3924; text: CR S3924) To modify a provision relating to the authorization of appropriations.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3859 proposed by Senator Ensign for Senator McCain to Amendment SA 3858.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3859 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
